name: Bunny Adventure Sound Star (Itch.io port)
description:
Are you tired of your best friend being stolen by a weird cloud and taken to the moon? Well, NOW: BUNNY ADVENTURE SOUND STAR. Explore 5 epic planets to find the epic emeralds and turn them into the sound star, meet up with different meme characters in your way, witness the destruction of Planet Notebook, return to Pirate Island from the first game and save your friend, Hazel the bunny! =:)

Before playing this, you must play Bunny Adventure Treasure Hunt, because there are spoilers.

Bunny Adventure Treasure Hunt: https://stevethebunny.itch.io/bunny-adventure-treasure-hunt-itchio-port

Original gamejolt version: https://gamejolt.com/games/bunny-adventure-sound-star/678764
